attributes.action: Petition for a televised debate between the Prime Minister and First Minister of Scotland, regarding Scottish independence.
attributes.additional_details: This petition requests that Prime Minister David Cameron take part in a televised debate with Scottish First Minister Alex Salmond, regarding Scottish independence. The continual avoidance from Downing St. is prohibiting the people of Scotland from making a fair and informed decision regarding the 2014 referendum. It's time that the Prime Minister of the UK fights for his union and proves his worth as a leader.
